#include <stdio.h>
 
int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
    long int t;
    int rem;
    long long int num;
    scanf(" %ld", &t);
    for (; t > 0; t--) {
        scanf(" %lld", &num);
        
        while (num != 1) {
            rem = num % 2;
            if (rem == 1) {
                printf("Yes\n");
                break;
            }
            num = num / 2;
        }
        if (num == 1) {
            printf("No\n");
        }
    }
    
    return 0;
}
